Package multimonster.common.media

Interface Summary
IMetaData The IMetaData interface combines read and write access for MetaData Properties.
IMetaDataReader The IMetaDataReader allows retrieving a MetaData Property Object with a given key.
IMetaDataWriter The IMetaDataWriter Interface allows setting a MetaData Property Object with a given key.
 

Class Summary
Actor  
Colorspace  
Duration  
MediaInstance concrete Media-File with fixed format and a defined location.
MediaObject Represents a media-object.
MetaData contains all content-based metadata for a MediaObject. format-based metadata is stored at Mediainstances.
MetaDataAccess A MetaDataAccess is concrete implementation of the IMetaData interface.
MIIdentifier  
MOGroup mediaObjects array may be empty; was just wrote down, because it could be useful some day
MOIdentifier encapsulates the identification of a MediaObject.
